name: Appart-Haus Carola
description:
central, quiet, sunny situation below Mayrhofen, with top view of Ahorn, Penken and Horberg, ideal starting point for sportive activities. 
Wireless-Lan, ground-level ski space, electric clothing and ski shoe dryer in the house, enough parking bays available, ski coach in close vicinity, walking time 1 minute. 
Summer: bicycle space, Zillertal travelling map, Strass to Mayrhofen for free!

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 4 or more bed rooms
